1.text: The name squirrel means shadow tail in ancient greek

2.text: Tree squirrels can go down a tree, head first

3.text: Squirrels leave almost everywhere on earth

4.text: Squirrels can get as old as twenty years

5.text: Squirrels eat mostly nuts and seeds

6.text: There are three hundreds species of squirrels

7.text: Flying squirrels can glide from tree to tree

8.text: Chipmunks are a type fo squirrels

9.text: Young squirrels are born naked and blind

10.text: Flying squirrels can fly a hundred meters

3.text: one day Shelly wanted to learn to run

5.text: suddenly it saw a pine tree

6.text: the pine tree moved even slower than Shelly

7.text: so Shelly raced the tree and won

8.text: Shelly was very happy to win a race

9.text: it went inside its home to celebrate

10.text: then it went to sleep and dreamt of lettuce
